name: JBS S.A.
description: JBS S.A. is one of the world's largest food companies and a leading global player in the meat processing industry. Founded in 1953 in Brazil, JBS specializes in producing beef, pork, and chicken products, serving customers in over 150 countries. The company operates a diversified portfolio that includes not only protein production but also processed foods, leather, and biodiesel. JBS is committed to sustainability and responsible sourcing, implementing initiatives to reduce its environmental footprint and promote animal welfare. The company has invested significantly in technology and innovation to enhance its production efficiency and product quality, ensuring it meets the evolving demands of consumers worldwide. With a robust supply chain and a presence in key markets, JBS continues to expand its operations while adapting to market trends, such as the growing demand for plant-based protein alternatives. The company’s mission is to feed the world responsibly and sustainably, contributing to food security and health through its extensive range of high-quality products.

seo.meta_title: JBS S.A. | Global Leader in Meat Processing and Food Production
seo.meta_description: Explore JBS S.A., a leading global food company specializing in beef, pork, and chicken production. Learn about their commitment to sustainability and innovation.

faq.question: What does JBS specialize in?
faq.answer: JBS specializes in meat processing, producing beef, pork, and chicken products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of JBS?
faq.answer: Gilberto Tomazoni is the CEO of JBS S.A.

faq.question: Where is JBS headquartered?
faq.answer: JBS is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.

faq.question: What are JBS's main products?
faq.answer: JBS's main products include beef, pork, chicken, sausages, and frozen meals.
